about_the_game:
What would you do if you have an app that collects location data of EVERY people on Earth NON-STOP?

In The Ultimate App: Find Everything and Everybody, you will have access to all the data. You can also investigate people and mysterious places to find useful information so that you can perform accurate people/place searching. Maybe the last suspect you find is actually the wanted serial killer.

Location Data and How To Use It

You will have many ways to use all the location data, including address searching, conditional place searching and conditional people searching. For example, you can search for places where the neighbour's wife went last night from 8 p.m. to 12 a.m., or search for people that secretly visited the neighbour's house during his work hours.

Real-World Cities and Maps

This game uses maps of real-world cities, including New York City, Paris, London, Beijing, etc. Find your own city in the game!

Real Cases and Famous Unsolved Crimes

This game never lacks the presence of famous cases and crimes. Find the mysteriously vanished child, locate the treasure buried by the famous thief, and identify the unidentified serial killer who murdered at least five women 20 years ago. Solve them with the help of The Ultimate App.

Different Equipment and Items

Equipment and Items can help you in many ways. They will assist your investigation of people, increase your efficiency of on-site searching, improve your employees' stats, etc. Discover more rare items when you unlock complex cases and hire more employees.

Employees and Management

You will have many employees to hire in the game. Some employees are good at on-site searching, some are great at communicating with witnesses, and some are experts at infiltrating. Try to be a good manager. They have their own skills and you can help your employees acquire them.

Events and Decisions

Unexpected things happen all the time in the game. Choose wisely and keep the impact minimal. Don't worry, sometimes it's even a gift.

Rating System

This game has a detailed rating system for each case. Earn your ratings after each case. Compete with friends or players around the world.
